name: lernmodule-courseware-blocks-vue2
description: A plugin for Stud.IP's Courseware providing a mindmap block
author: Ann Yanich

scripts.build: vue-cli-service build --target lib --name lernmodule-courseware-blocks --formats umd,umd-min src/register-courseware-blocks.js
scripts.watch: vue-cli-service build --target lib --name lernmodule-courseware-blocks --formats umd,umd-min --watch src/register-courseware-blocks.js
